properties.description:
Supporting those with addiction with recovery groups, health checks and needle exchange. A warm welcome, free community kitchen serving hot and cold food daily. Access to a number of services including Inspire, NHS mental health, opticians, HEP C testing, health checks, Shelter, Red Rose, Elisha House, treatment room and podiatry.
We offer a range of inhouse and external services providing advice, information and guidance on housing, addiction and mental and physical health.

properties.description:
Cosy coal fire going all day. TV with lots of seating. We can offer unlimited tea and coffee for Â£1.50. A place for people to chat and swap ideas of cost of living and keeping warm. We have blankets if people need something extra to wrap up in.
CHARGES: We can offer unlimited tea and coffee for a cost if Â£1.50

hours._text: We are open 2pm to 10pm during the week

properties.title: Craven Heifer

properties.description:
We have a small inside cafe area where you can enjoy tea, coffee, cold drinks, hot chocolate, biscuits, toast and soup. Its is bright and cheery, obviously things to read are about gardenling and wildlife. You can also sit in our classroom, draw, paint, play cards, read a book etc. We have a jolly bunch of volunteers that come for social company and some come to garden, no pressure, all ages welcome.
We can put you in touch with people to support with financial problems. We can advise people and how easy it is to grow your own food, how beneficial getting out in green spaces is
BUS: Light refreshments are free to all our members
CHARGES: Free of Charge when visitors mention warm hearts
